short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly discover and save on sustainable used alternatives while you shop online.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Buy Used Buddy automatically suggests the best 'used' shops, sites, and brands - as sustainable alternatives to buying 'new' - when you shop on Amazon, Nordstrom, or other retail websites. It's never been easier to save money and save the planet at the same time.

How Buy Used Buddy works: 

• Shop online with Amazon, Nordstrom, or other popular brand-name e-commerce websites as you typically would. 

• Buy Used Buddy automatically suggests used-friendly, sustainable shops and marketplaces selling products similar to your search. 

• Save money by buying 'used' while discovering unique, pre-loved products from local shops, online marketplaces, and more that are helping our planet.

With the free Buy Used Buddy chrome extension, it's never been easier to save money, waste less, and reduce your environmental impact!
